1.wait for a few day or months like me after people finished downloading so there are enough seeds

3.there are other ways to download a torrent like in rslog which is always up and never cut seeds like here

4.to download a torrent u need to have a the ram of the pc the most free as possible becuase u use internet and play music or video it slows down the torrent becuase u your pc usage

This game works perfectly: At first I got an error report saying something about Side to Side something something, then I went into the redist folder & updated the directx & have had no issues since, my advise is to do this before you bother starting the game, Thanx Chris, your becoming one of my favorite uploaders, Cheers.
